description: a real-time viz for AmeriFlux sensor data output at UMBS AmeriFlux core site

options.content:
- data began uploading on July 6th, so no data are older
- queries only go back ${daysToQuery} days, so changing the time frame won't get data older than that  
  - soil data queries go back ${soilDaysToQuery}
- all data are retained 7 days, except soil data which is retained 30 days
- GitHub code (requires GitHub account and UMBS org access): https://github.com/um-biological-station/AmeriFlux-dashboard-sync

- drag over a zone to zoom in
- click on names in the legend to view the trendline alone
- only view one dropdown at a time so that data loads faster
- if a graph isn't showing any data, try changing the time range and refreshing     
- click the i in the top left corner of a graph for a description of where the data are from and, if averaged, over what time period

panels.description: sample air temperature at 46m, 34m, 15m; 10-minute average air temperature at 3m
panels.title: Air Temperature by Height

panels.description: RH measured at 46m, 34m, 15m; 10-second average RH at 3m
panels.title: Relative Humidity by Height

panels.description: sonic temperature at 46m, 34m
panels.title: Sonic Air Temperature by Height

panels.title: Average Air Temperature by Height
